targets.rawSql: SELECT $__time(to_timestamp("Date" || ' ' || "Time", 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') ), NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision as anomaly_score FROM predictions_staging WHERE NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision IS NOT NULL ORDER BY 1;

SELECT $__time(to_timestamp("Date" || ' ' || "Time", 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') ), sum(CASE WHEN lower("pred_attack") IN ('true','t','1','yes') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as attacks FROM predictions_staging WHERE to_timestamp("Date" || ' ' || "Time", 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') IS NOT NULL GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1;
SELECT count(*) FROM predictions_staging WHERE lower("pred_attack") IN ('true','t','1','yes') AND $__timeFilter(to_timestamp("Date" || ' ' || "Time", 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') );

SELECT avg(NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision) FROM predictions_staging WHERE NULLIF("anomaly_score", '')::double precision IS NOT NULL AND $__timeFilter(to_timestamp("Date" || ' ' || "Time", 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') );
